headline: Baxter International Inc. (BAX): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Baxter International Inc. on DeepValue Capital’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on BAX. Baxter International Inc.’s share was trading at $22.44 as of August 4th. BAX’s trailing and forward P/E were 84.46 and 8.71, respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
